## Inputs {.sidebar data-width=500}

The scenario `FPV2MA` compared to baseline. Difference values represent scenario value - baseline value and are in feet. 

```{r}
selectInput(
  inputId = "which_month",
  label = "Select Month",
  choices = c(
    "May" = 5,
    "Jun" = 6,
    "Jul" = 7,
    "Aug" = 8,
    "Sep" = 9,
    "Oct" = 10,
    "Nov" = 11
  ), selected = 5)

selectInput(
  inputId = "which_year", 
  label = "Select Year", 
  choices = 2020:2023, 
  selected = 2020
)


selectInput(
  inputId = "which_stat", 
  label = "Select Statistic", 
  choices = c("Min", "Max", "Mean"), 
  selected = "Mean"
)

output$data_table <- renderDT({
  req(filtered_data()) 

  filtered_data() |> 
    st_set_geometry(NULL) |>  
    select(name, min_diff, mean_diff, max_diff) |> 
    filter(name %in% c('MHO', 'OLD', 'DGL')) |> 
    mutate(
      min_diff = round(min_diff, 1), 
      mean_diff = round(mean_diff, 1),
      max_diff = round(max_diff, 1)
    ) 
}, options = list(
  searching = FALSE,  
  lengthChange = FALSE,  
  paging = FALSE, 
  info = FALSE,
  scrollY = "150" 
))

# Output the data table
DTOutput("data_table")

```

## Column {data-width="100" data-height="100"}

## Map

```{r}
filtered_data <- reactive({
   req(input$which_month, input$which_year)
  
  final_summary |> 
    filter(month == input$which_month,
           year == input$which_year) 
})

stat <- reactive({
  req(input$which_stat)
  
  switch(input$which_stat, 
         "Min" = 'min_diff', 
         "Max" = 'max_diff',
         "Mean" = 'mean_diff')
  
})

legend_title <- reactive({
  req(input$which_stat)
  
  switch(input$which_stat, 
         "Min" = 'Min Stage Diff (ft)', 
         "Max" = 'Max Stage Diff (ft)',
         "Mean" = 'Mean Stage Diff (ft)')
  
})

# output$tbl <- renderDataTable(
#   filtered_data() |> 
#     filter(name %in% c('OLD', 'MID', 'GLC')) |> 
#     select(name, min_diff, max_diff, mean_diff) |> 
#     head()
# )

# Render Leaflet map
output$map <- renderLeaflet({
  req(filtered_data())

  channels_merge <- filtered_data()

  # Define color palette
  palette <- colorNumeric(
    palette = "viridis",
    domain = c(channels_merge$min_diff, channels_merge$max_diff)
    #domain = channels_merge[[stat()]]
  )

  leaflet() |> 
    addTiles(urlTemplate = "https://{s}.basemaps.cartocdn.com/light_all/{z}/{x}/{y}{r}.png",
             attribution = '&copy; <a href="https://www.openstreetmap.org/copyright">OpenStreetMap</a> contributors &copy; <a href="https://carto.com/">CARTO</a>') |> 
    addPolylines(
      data = channels_merge,
      color = ~palette(get(stat())),
      popup = ~paste0(
        "ID: ", id, "<br>",
        "Name: ", name, "<br>",
        legend_title()," :", round(get(stat()), 1), "<br>",
        "Scenario: ", "fpv2ma"
      )
    ) |> 
    addLegend(
      position = "bottomright",
      pal = palette,
      values = channels_merge[[stat()]],
      title = legend_title(),
      opacity = 1
    )
})

# Map output
leafletOutput("map", width = "100%", height = "100%")

```
